mapper.insert: insert into `systemmenu` (text, url, parent_id, permission_id) values (#{text}, #{url}, #{parent.id}, #{permission.id})
mapper.select: select s.id, s.text, s.url, ps.id ps_id, ps.url ps_url, ps.text ps_text, p.id p_id,p.name p_name, p.resource p_resource from `systemmenu` s left join systemmenu ps on s.parent_id = ps.id left join permission p on s.permission_id = p.id from `systemmenu` where s.id = #{id}

select s.id, s.text, s.url, ps.id ps_id, ps.url ps_url, ps.text ps_text, p.id p_id, p.name p_name, p.resource p_resource from `systemmenu` s left join systemmenu ps on s.parent_id = ps.id left join permission p on s.permission_id = p.id
select count(s.id) from `systemmenu` s left join systemmenu ps on s.parent_id = ps.id left join permission p on s.permission_id = p.id

select s.id, s.text, s.url, ps.id ps_id, ps.url ps_url, ps.text ps_text, p.id p_id,p.name p_name, p.resource p_resource from `systemmenu` s left join systemmenu ps on s.parent_id = ps.id left join permission p on s.permission_id = p.id limit #{startIndex},#{rows}

select s.id, s.text, s.url, ps.id ps_id, ps.url ps_url, ps.text ps_text, p.id p_id,p.name p_name, p.resource p_resource from `systemmenu` s left join systemmenu ps on s.parent_id = ps.id left join permission p on s.permission_id = p.id where s.url = ''
select id, text, url from systemMenu where parent_id is null
